description.value:
Your shield ally is more than just a spirit of protection-it's a conduit for deadly divine magic.

When you use your shield ally to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shield Block] a melee unarmed attack or a melee weapon Strike from an adjacent creature, the attacker takes @Damage[1d6[void]] damage.

If the attack or Strike breaks or destroys your shield, double this additional damage.

The damage the attacker takes increases to @Damage[2d6[void]] at 11th level and @Damage[3d6[void]] at 16th level.
